name: ElCamino.AspNetCore.Identity.AzureTable
title: Azure Table Storage Provider for ASP.NET Identity Core
description: Azure Table Storage Provider to support AspNet Identity Core 1.1 frameworks for .NET Standard and Core.
copyright: Copyright Â©  2017 David Melendez, MIT License

packOptions.releaseNotes: Supports AspNetCore.Identity 1.1 frameworks for .NET Standard and Core. Implementing support for RoleClaims and external UserTokens. Minor threading improvements. Updated Windows Storage reference to v8.0. Important! Check https://dlmelendez.github.io/identityazuretable/#/migration for data migration information.
packOptions.summary: Azure Table Storage Provider to support AspNet Identity Core 1.1
